None.Name: Infused Reserve
None.Description:
If the unit has less
than 450 life points left it will extend
its frosty spikes. In this emergence
state it will then reflect 30% of all
damage done to it in close combat
to the attacker.

None.Name: Agility
None.Description: Gains fast movement speed near friendly structures (Swift movement speed)
